channel.title: Welcome to my showcase! on Krzysztof Wilczyński
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to my showcase! on Krzysztof Wilczyński

item.title: Projects
item.description: Unfortunately, most of the projects I’ve been professionally involved in cannot be cited on this page due to confidentiality agreements signed with my previous employers. However, this page will showcase my private, smaller projects. Estetyczna Tychy This is a static web application built from scratch using Vanilla JS and SCSS. Why Vanilla JS? Because I wanted to see if I could write this type of application without using modern frameworks like Vue.
